title: A Practical Guide to RecordBuilder in Java
briefSummary: Learn about the RecordBuilder library to enhance Java records with a builder pattern, bridging the gap between immutability and flexible construction.

title: Extracting Flat and Nested Keys from a JSONObject
briefSummary: Learn how to extract all the keys from a JSON object for tasks such as validation, transformation, and data mapping.

title: How to Convert Nested Loops to Stream in Java
briefSummary: Shows how to replace nested loops with Java Streams to achieve a more declarative, readable, and efficient data processing style.

title: Sorting Alphanumeric Strings in Java
briefSummary: Explores three approaches to sorting alphanumeric strings in Java, including lexicographic ordering, natural sorting with custom comparators, and mixed case handling.

title: Find Elements with Max Difference in Java Array
briefSummary: Presents several techniques to find the maximum difference between any two elements in an integer array in Java, discussing efficiency and edge cases.

title: Determining All Years Starting on a Sunday Within a Given Year Range
briefSummary: Shows different ways to compute all years that start on a Sunday within a given range using Java date and time APIs.

title: Removing Log Files with a Cron Job in Linux
briefSummary: A short guide on cleaning up old log files using cron and logrotate on Linux to manage disk usage and keep logs tidy.

title: Cycle Sort Algorithm
briefSummary: Introduces the Cycle Sort algorithm, which sorts an array using the minimum possible number of swaps by rotating elements through their correct positions.
